caption: User
name: user
description: The user object describes the identity of a user. Defined by D3FEND d3f:UserAccount.

account.description: The user's account or the account associated with the user.

domain.description: The domain where the user is defined. For example: the LDAP or Active Directory domain.

groups.description: The administrative groups to which the user belongs.

org.description: Organization and org unit related to the user.

type.description: The type of the user. For example, System, AWS IAM User, etc.

3.description: System account. For example, Windows computer accounts with a trailing dollar sign ($).
3.caption: System

uid.description: The unique user identifier. For example, AWS ARN, or Windows user SID.
